tool_description: Extracts review data from various sources including CSV files, databases, and APIs, with filtering capabilities for date ranges and specific products.

data_source_type.description: Type of data source: csv, database, api

source_path.description: Path or URL to the data source

product_ids.description: List of specific product IDs to extract

error_messages: Invalid data source type: Use one of [csv, database, api]
Source path not accessible: Verify the file path or URL is correct and accessible
Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ)
Date range error: date_from must be earlier than date_to
Empty dataset: No reviews found matching the specified criteria
usage: Specify the data_source_type and source_path, then optionally filter by date range or specific product IDs. The tool will extract and return structured review data.

product_ids.description: List of unique product identifiers in the dataset

date_range.description: Actual date range of extracted reviews
